articles.content: New Zealands bowlers produced a late final session surge to guide their side to a tense 101-run victory over Pakistan in the first Test in Mount Maunganui and kept alive their hopes of reaching next … [+1204 chars]

articles.title: 'Absurd': Female F1 hopeful opens up about sexist sponsor offer - Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.description: W-Series star Emma Kimilainen has opened up about a sexist sponsorship proposal she once had to knock back earlier in her career.
articles.content: W-Series driver Emma Kimilainen has opened up about rejecting an offer to drive in the Indy Lights series after a sponsor asked her to pose for a men's magazine as part of the deal. Picture: Instagra… [+3500 chars]
